Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its true potential when it comes to your specific needs and ambitions. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $800000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it can bring to you. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, contributing to your success and growth. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am here to assist you every step of the way. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
